JobFullDesc: Core Services Engineering (CSE), part of Cloud+AI, builds and manages the critical products and services that Microsoft runs on. We boldly pursue big ideas that power transformational advances at Microsoft and for our customers, while helping Microsoft teams work smarter, faster, and more securely. CSE product teams have deep technical and business expertise, customer insights, and a clear point of view that comes from first-hand, large-scale experience with Microsoft and industry solutions.  Within CSE, the Enterprise 360 (E360) team is uniquely positioned to contribute to Microsoft’s digital transformation by reinventing the fabric that connects, hosts, and supports the enterprise infrastructure that is the bedrock of our company. A key initiative within E360 is ‘Intelligent Infrastructure’ that leverages big data, AI/ML, automation, and modern DevOps practices to infuse our enterprise infrastructure with autonomous, proactive optimization & self-healing capabilities. Intelligent Infrastructure is a large, cross-E360 initiative that brings together multiple E360’s engineering investments and Microsoft’s cloud offerings to achieve this goal. As a Prinicipal PM Manager in this space, you will play a pivotal role in this effort and own several critical foundational platforms & services. You will build these platforms and services with a first-party equals third-party vision, producing reusable code and data artifacts and contribute towards a blueprint for global enterprises undergoing digitalization of their own infrastructure. What makes this job great?Exciting charter, in an area of growth in the industry, with ample room for innovation and plenty of challenges left to conquer.Cutting edge big data, AI/ML, automation & other network infrastructure technologies to apply to digital transformation at Microsoft and in the industry.Friendly and talented team, on the same mission togetherOpportunities to work with external enterprise customers and teams across Microsoft.ResponsibilitiesHire, lead and grow a talented team of PMs to deliver critical platforms and services that accrue to our intelligent infrastructure efforts.Work with internal and external customers to understand their scenarios and business drivers.Innovate end-to-end and stay informed on industry trends in your space.Develop product plans and roadmaps, define capabilities and drive project execution.
